attributes.review: This app is horrible it will delete all of your information and send it to aliens that will then probe you😱 that’s not even the worst part, it will fill your gallery with pictures a human that looks like a Cheeto while doing exercise and a beer belly pressing up against the 📷 just disgusting
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: This app is DISGUSTING.!! It is soo bad that my phone almost exploded. I got at least 20 pictures of trumps nudes. The amount of glitches on this app is ASTRONOMICAL! And that not even the worst part. As soon as I downloaded the app I got spammed with dearth and rape threats if I didnt vote for trump. 300 secret agents dressed in the cooors of trump, ORANGE, came knocking at my door and tried to kidnap me and have me vote for trump and they even gave me CORONA. 100% would NOT RECOMMEND. And that’s on PERIDOT.
attributes.title: One star cause I can’t give zero🤮🤮🤮😡😡😡🤬🤬🤬🤬

attributes.review: I got this app to Support my future president that I loved so much but after downloading the app I realized I should of listened to the reviews.There are more bad reviews then good because this app is BAD.I started downloading the app and it took a whole week to download a WEEK there is not reason it should of took that long and when I got into the app it started screaming bad things at me like go back to your country and telling me to make it a sandwich(between you and me I think that someone was watching me through the app)and I was so scared.Then the app started glitching out my phone and making the screen go orange it was so weird that wasn’t even the worst part the worst part was when the trump ninjas came flying through my window and telling to me to rate the app five stars but my best friends mothers dad grandmother taught me how to fight so I fought them off and got a call from the police that they would arrest me but they rather kill innocent people instead. This app has caused me so much trauma and I started seeing a therapist just to cope with the trauma but this was an unforgettable experience that I might not ever people able to move on from
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP

attributes.review: this was the worst app i’ve ever used. i got onto it after 2.3540185 years to download (literally) and it didn’t even load just went black and my phone went hot and the screen broke. i had an iphone 11 pro that i spent years saving up to upgrade from an android. i work two part time jobs and am a student this is hard earned money that your orange head is stealing from the hard working people
attributes.title: no thanks

attributes.review: i opened the app only to see an orange waving, and then after a day of having the app mr.donald trump came to my house and ran over my grandma 4 times. then he proceeded to rip off my arms and slap me with them repeatedly. he started chanting a curse on my family and now we all have orange dusty skin and a lifetime warranty spray tan machine in our living room. basically this app is horrible, violent, and disturbing.
attributes.title: horrible

attributes.review: This app is HORRIBLE this app gave me directions to the gym and told me to lose some weight fatty it hurt my feelings that a cheeto man told ME to lose some weight
attributes.title: Add my tiktok infant.kicker

attributes.review: This app greeted me with a racial slur as soon as I opened it for the first time. Must have stolen my information and sold it for profit but I guess that’s okay because at least it still has biased, brainwashed, racist and idiotic information on it!
attributes.title: Literal butt cheek on a stick

attributes.review: I downloaded the app FIRST OF ALL it took F O R E V E R  to download then when it finnally did all i can see was  🟠 A STALE CHEETO????🟠 Like i was so confused then i deleted the app and downloaded it again to see if it would fix whatever it was i open it only to see ORANGES?????? 🍊At this point im telling myself surly this has to be a joke why would they create an app just to model a stale cheeto and oranges? 🤨 VERY CONFUSED 🤷‍♀️ ‼️DONT DOWNLOAD THIS UNLESS ASS‼️
attributes.title: Is mine broken??? 👁👄👁✨✨
